p: The standard curve covered the range from 10.8 to 1.08 × 10 10 copies. The curve showed a strong linear relationship with a high coefficient of determination (R 2 = 0.996) and a high amplification efficiency (E = 0.965). The limit of quantification represented log 10 3.6 BCoV GC per swab from human nasal mucosa and fomites.
